title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the requirements for the declarative machine learning library, including the desired features, functionality, target audience, performance expectations, scalability requirements, and integration with existing systems or frameworks.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture for the library, including the core components, data structures, and APIs.

title: Implement Core Library Components
description: Develop the core components of the library, including the declarative model definition, training, and evaluation modules.

title: Develop Supporting Utilities and Tools
description: Implement supporting utilities and tools for data preprocessing, model serialization, and deployment.

title: Create Documentation and Examples
description: Write comprehensive documentation and provide examples for using the library effectively.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deployment of the library.

title: Develop Test Suite
description: Create a comprehensive test suite to ensure the library's functionality and reliability.

title: Perform Security Audits
description: Conduct security audits to identify and mitigate potential vulnerabilities in the library.
